dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6409 IH: Repeal CFPB Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Donalds (for himself, Mr. Budd, Mr. Mooney, and Mr. Arrington) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To eliminate the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Repeal CFPB Act.

The Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 (12 U.S.C. 5481 et seq.) is repealed, and the provisions of law amended or repealed by that Act are restored or revived as if the Act had not been enacted.
